fleetly_subtitle: Streamline vehicle tracking, maintenance schedules, and critical date reminders. Fleetly is your all-in-one solution for optimal fleet performance.
unlock_efficiency_title: Unlock Efficiency with Fleetly's Core Features
unlock_efficiency_subtitle: From comprehensive vehicle profiles to smart reminders, Fleetly keeps you ahead.
simple_steps_title: Simple Steps to Smarter Fleet Management
simple_steps_subtitle: Getting started with Fleetly is quick and easy.
register_account_step_description: Sign up in minutes and set up your personalized fleet dashboard.
add_vehicles_step_description: Easily input vehicle details, including type, make, model, and key dates.
track_optimize_step_description: Receive smart reminders for services and inspections. Stay compliant, save costs.
final_cta_title: Ready to elevate your fleet's performance?
final_cta_subtitle: Join countless fleet managers simplifying their operations with Fleetly.
sign_in_subtitle: Sign in to access your dashboard.
manage_fleet_subtitle: Manage your fleet smarter, not harder.
password_validation_error: Password must be at least 8 characters and contain a number.
verification_unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred during verification. Please try again later.
feature_dashboard_description: Get a real-time overview of your entire fleet at a glance, with key metrics and insights.
feature_tracking_description: Monitor vehicle locations and routes to optimize dispatch and enhance efficiency.
feature_maintenance_description: Never miss a service with automated reminders and detailed service history logs.
feature_date_reminders_description: Stay compliant with timely alerts for registrations, inspections, and license renewals.
feature_cost_optimization_description: Track expenses and identify areas for savings to improve your fleet’s profitability.
feature_mobile_accessibility_description: Manage your fleet on the go with a fully responsive and optimized mobile experience.
testimonial_sarah_quote: Fleetly reminded me to renew my registration—saved me a $200 late fee! It's an indispensable tool for staying compliant.
testimonial_mike_quote: I used to forget oil changes and other essential maintenance. Now my truck runs smoother than ever, and I've seen a noticeable reduction in unexpected breakdowns. Fleetly is a game-changer.
testimonial_david_quote: Tracking my fleet's maintenance has never been easier. From services to registration dates, Fleetly keeps everything organized. It truly pays for itself in avoided repair costs and peace of mind.
testimonial_lisa_quote: The registration reminders alone are worth it. No more last-minute DMV runs or scrambling for documents. This app keeps me perfectly on schedule.
testimonial_chris_quote: Implementing Fleetly streamlined our operations significantly. The ability to track specific engine hours for our heavy machinery has been invaluable for preventive maintenance.
